Self.Wiki: Determines the contents of treasures and other item rewards.

lotItem_Rarity.Wiki: Determines the SFX used to display the rarity of the treasure lot.

lotItemCategory01.Wiki: The item category the awarded item belongs to.

lotItemId01.Wiki: The ID of the item awarded by this slot.

lotItemNum01.Wiki: The amount of the specified item given if the item in this slot is rolled.

lotItemBasePoint01.Wiki: The weighting for the awarded item in this slot.

QWCBasePoint01.Wiki: The weight applied to the item roll based on World Tendency.

QWCAppliesPoint01.Wiki: The value of World Tendency required for the item roll calculationss to include the QWCBasePoint weight.

enableLuck01.Wiki: Apply the luck modifier for this slot. Linked to the Item Discovery stat.

eventId.Wiki: The event flag ID that determines if this item lot is rolled.
